languages.text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of movement points.
Also, the wearer gains momentum equal to their resolve each time they suffer damage from attacks of opportunity.

The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text:
装备者在敌人附近移动时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}不会额外增加。
此外，每当装备者受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
装备者在敌人附近移动时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}不会额外增加。
此外，每当装备者受到{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}伤害时，都会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text:
Персонаж может перемещаться по клеткам, соседним с противниками, расходуя обычное количество {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g}.
Также при каждом получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g} персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, равный своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж может перемещаться по клеткам, соседним с противниками, расходуя обычное количество очков передвижения.
Также при каждом получении урона от атак по возможности персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.

Персонаж может перемещаться по клеткам, соседним с противниками, расходуя обычное количество очков передвижения.
Также при каждом получении урона от атак по возможности персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.

languages.text:
使用者は通常量の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を消費して、敵に隣接するセルを移動できる。
さらに、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}から{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}覚悟{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は通常量の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を消費して、敵に隣接するセルを移動できる。
さらに、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}によるダメージを受けるたびに{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text:
El portador puede moverse por las casillas adyacentes a enemigos gastando la cantidad normal de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}.
Además, el portador obtiene la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El portador puede moverse por las casillas adyacentes a enemigos gastando la cantidad normal de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}.
Además, el portador obtiene la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} cada vez que sufre daño de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text:
Der Träger kann sich über an Feinden angrenzende Zellen bewegen und verbraucht dabei die normale Menge {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}.
Außerdem erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} jedes mal wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} erleidet.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger kann sich über an Feinden angrenzende Zellen bewegen und verbraucht dabei die normale Menge {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}.
Außerdem erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} jedes mal wenn er Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} erleidet.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur peut se déplacer sur les cases adjacentes aux ennemis en dépensant le nombre normal de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}.
De plus, il bénéficie d'une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égale à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} provenant d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
